author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-5442] [89-fb] Use builder pattern in StoreFile and
HFile Summary: Cleaning up the factory method explosion in HFile
writer and StoreFile. Now, adding a new parameter to
HFile/StoreFile writer initialization will not require modifying
factory method invocations all over the codebase.
HFile writer parameters in 89-fb that are not there in trunk are:
favoredNodes, bloom error rate (customized for the column family), bits
per checksum.
This patch also has a bit more cleanup than the trunk version
(https://reviews.facebook.net/D1893), getting rid of a couple more
annoying constructors. That additional cleanup will be contributed to
trunk as a follow-up patch.
Test Plan: Unit tests, deploy to dev cluster
Reviewers: khemani, kannan, liyintang, kranganathan, nspiegelberg
Reviewed By: kannan
Differential Revision: https://reviews.facebook.net/D1941

author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-5357] [89-fb] Refactoring: use the builder pattern for
HColumnDescriptor Summary: Deprecate three ugly HColumnDescriptor
constructors and use a "builder" pattern instead, e.g. new
HColumnDescriptor(cfName).setMaxVersions(5).setBlockSize(8192),
etc. Setters have now become "builder" methods.
This is the 89-fb version of https://reviews.facebook.net/D1851.
Test Plan: Run unit tests
Reviewers: kannan, liyintang, kranganathan
Reviewed By: kannan
CC: stack
Differential Revision: https://reviews.facebook.net/D1929
